text: Kunai yasto manisa jasala'i ki allahale kitaba, tatvajnana ra ‘‘nabuvata’’ (dutatva) pradana gareko cha yo thika ho'ina ki usale manisaharula'i bhanos ki allahala'i chodera mero bhakta bha'ihala baru (usale ke bhanne cha ki) timi sabai allahako bha'ihala, yasa karana ki timile uniharula'i kitaba sika'une garchau ra padha'une garchau
